faceRegistration.title: Face Registration
faceRegistration.description: Capture {{min}}-{{max}} face photos from different angles to register

steps.step2: Step 2: Position your face in frame
steps.step1Description: Click allow to enable your device camera
steps.step2Description: Keep your face within the marked area, ensure your face is clear and complete
steps.step3Description: Wait for auto-capture or press capture button when ready
steps.step4Description: Review the photo and confirm to complete registration

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.subtitle: Follow these steps to successfully register your face

lighting.title: Lighting
lighting.description: Capture in well-lit area, avoid strong backlight or shadows

angle.title: Angle
angle.description: Look directly at camera, avoid tilting head or extreme angles

distance.title: Distance
distance.description: Maintain appropriate distance (about 50-80cm), ensure face fits in frame

expression.title: Expression
expression.description: Keep natural expression, eyes open, no sunglasses or face coverings

status.positionFace: Position your face in the frame
status.noFaceDetected: No face detected. Please position your face in the frame.
status.multipleFaces: Multiple faces detected. Please keep only one face in the frame.
status.faceInGoodPosition: Face is in good position. You can capture photo.
status.showFullFace: Please show your full face (eyes, nose, mouth).
status.faceCovered: Face is covered. Please show your full face.

voice.positionFace: Hello! Please position your face in the frame
voice.multipleFaces: Multiple faces detected. Please keep only one face in the frame
voice.showFullFace: Please show your full face including eyes, nose and mouth
voice.faceCovered: Face is covered. Please show your full face
voice.centerFace: Please move your face to the center of the frame
voice.moveAway: Please move a bit further away
voice.waitForGoodPosition: Please wait for face to be in good position before capturing
voice.faceNotReady: Face does not meet requirements. Please wait for system confirmation
voice.lowQuality: Image quality too low. Please improve lighting and position
voice.lowQualityRemoved: Removed {{count}} low quality images. Please capture again

errors.modelLoadFailed: Failed to load recognition model. Please reload the page.
errors.detectionFailed: Face detection error. Please reload the page.
errors.waitForGoodPosition: Please wait for face to be in good position before capturing.
errors.faceNotReady: Face does not meet requirements. Please wait for system confirmation.
errors.lowQuality: Image quality too low ({{quality}}%). Please improve lighting and position.
errors.captureFailed: Failed to capture photo. Please check conditions again.
errors.autoCaptureFailed: Auto capture failed. Please check conditions again.
errors.insufficientQualityImages: Only {{current}} images meet quality requirements. Please capture at least {{needed}} more images.
errors.cameraPermissionDenied: Camera permission denied. Please grant permission in browser settings
errors.cameraNotAvailable: Camera not available. Please check your device
errors.imageQualityLow: Photo is too blurry or unclear. Please retake with better lighting
errors.noFaceDetectedDescription: No face found in image. Please ensure your face is within frame and clear
errors.multipleFacesDescription: System detected more than one face. Please capture photo with only your face
errors.poorLightingDescription: Photo is too dark or too bright. Please capture in evenly lit area
errors.badAngleDescription: Angle is too tilted or not straight. Please look directly at camera and retake
errors.networkErrorDescription: Cannot connect to server. Please check internet connection and try again
errors.aiServiceErrorDescription: Cannot process image with AI service. Please try again later
errors.registrationFailedDescription: An error occurred during face registration. Please try again
errors.unknownErrorDescription: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later

success.title: Registration Successful!
success.message: Your face has been registered successfully
success.description: You can now use facial recognition for attendance
success.nextStep1: You can now use face recognition for check-in
success.nextStep2: Ensure adequate lighting and clear face when checking in
success.nextStep3: If you encounter issues, you can update your registration photo

toasts.lowQualityRemoved: Automatically removed {{count}} low quality images. Please capture again.

preview.title: Photo Preview
preview.instructions: Review the photo before confirming registration

alreadyRegistered.title: Face Already Registered
alreadyRegistered.message: You have already registered your face

accessibility.keyboardShortcuts: Keyboard shortcuts: Space (capture), Esc (back), V (toggle voice)
accessibility.captureInstruction: Press Space or capture button to take photo
accessibility.galleryNavigation: Use arrow keys to navigate image gallery
accessibility.statusAnnouncements: Face detection status will be announced

performance.adaptiveThrottling: Automatically adjusting performance for your device

chatbot.title: AI Assistant
chatbot.welcomeWithName: Hi {{name}}! I'm your AI assistant. What would you like to know?
chatbot.welcomeMessage: Ask me about your attendance, payroll, leave requests, or request reports. I'm here to help!
chatbot.hint: Try asking: "How many days have I worked this month?" or "Generate payroll report"
